long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily snipe best ranked NFTs from your favourite marketplace.
We support : MagicEden, Opensea.io, Raydium, Alpha.art , DigitalEyes.

Official Links: https://linktr.ee/solsnipernft

Our features:
- Show ranks from howrare and moonrank on supported marketplaces.
  - Howrare own ranking system more info on their website.
  - Moonrank rankings are calculated using statistical ranking system.

- The extension pop-up allows you to :
    - Enable/Disable ranks to be shown.
    - Enter your own thresholds and colors for colouring ranks.
    - Ranks page allows you to delete the rankings saved in the local storage.
    - Enter your own mappings. 
    On mappings page you can enter your own mappings to make sure that we find the 
    rankings. The names can be found at the end of the urls:
      - For example: 
        Mapping Solana Monkey Business collection on Magic Eden with rankings from 
        Howrare, you will have the following:
          - Magiceden link : https://www.magiceden.io/marketplace/solana_monkey_business
          - Howrare link : https://howrare.is/smb
      - You will have to set in the popup the following:
          - Marketplace Collection ID : solana_monkey_business
          - Howrare Collection ID : smb

More details about the extension, release notes and how to use it can be found on Github.
